column4: Hi all. I have a little problem with my wireless usb adapter. I'm using Ubuntu Lucid. It works properly, however, sometimes it just disconnects and stops working. And I cannot find wlan0 in ifconfig. This usually happens when I have high traffic. It also happened the other day when i had my external HD connected. And it stopped recognizing the external HD too. I can fix it with rmmod ndiswrapper. then modprobe ndiswrapper. But I w
as wondering if there was a way to just not have it happen at all
Sounds like your USB ports don't have enough power.
would i somehow be able to change that? or is it just that my computer sucks ;o
